data.actual_result: The offline icon uses the non-colorblind, filled gray icon.
data.expected_result: The offline icon (next to "n members") should use the outlined icon style seen in the status menu, DM list, and friend list.
data.short_description: Server invite embeds ignore colorblind setting in offline icon
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable colorblind mode in Settings > Appearance. - Create a new server invite link or retrieve an existing unexpired one. - In a text channel where you have embed permissions, send the invite link. - The invite link is embedded, showing the server title and member counts.
